text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here!
Yes its me Bob...
Join me for learning street with Bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our Phonics show..
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
“Da Da da da Say hello to Mr.D
We need him daily
Da da da da da I am Mr.D
Am here to show you words that start with Me start with D

Da da da da da da duck laid an egg
Da da da da da da Dancer shakes a leg 
Shakes a leg

Da da da da da Daffodils bloom
Da da da  da da da Dolls in the playroom 
Dolls in the playroom

Da Da Da da da Dog wags its tail
Da da da da da da Dolphin is a whale 
Dolphin is a whale

Da da da da da Dove is all white 
Da da da da da da diamond shining bright
Shining bright

Da da da da da deer is really fast
Da da da da da da doctor puts a cast 
Puts a cast

Da Da da da da Delightful  Mr.D
Da da da da da da We need him daily
Need him daily
So, judges, are you ready to show us your scores.

DAZZLING ! DELIGHTFUL!
DELICIOUS!  DASHING!
Thankyou Mr.D and delightful judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters.
Till then Bye bye !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
